title: Bridge your assets securely with Base
text: This project is in testing. You can bridge whitelisted ERC-20 tokens from Goerli (Ethereum testnet) to Base Goerli Testnet. Ethereum mainnet tokens are not yet supported.

items.title: 1. CONNECT YOUR WALLET
items.text: You can use any Ethereum wallet that supports the Goerli testnet and Base.

items.title: 2. CHOOSE TOKENS TO BRIDGE
items.text: You can bridge ETH, cbETH, or wBTC between Goerli and Base.

items.title: 2. CONFIRM TRANSACTION
items.text: Confirm the transaction in your wallet and wait for your tokens to transfer.
